text: The 1991 Regal Welsh Professional Championship was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, which took place in May 1991. This was the final edition of the tournament. Darren Morgan won the tournament defeating Mark Bennett 9–3 in the final. ==Main draw== ==References== Welsh Professional Championship Welsh Professional Championship Welsh Professional Championship Category:Sport in Wales Category:Defunct snooker competitions
title: 1991 Welsh Professional Championship
